title: Electronics
brief_description: Aspects of electronic engineering in Britain, applied in fields ranging from television to space research. Computers which can play chess and translante languages; the devices used for radio and telecommunications, medical research and treatment, the remote control of space rockets; shows how one can “listen in” to the stars through the giant radio telescope at Jodrell Bank.
